data.title: Frontend Developer
data.content:
Glohow was founded in 2016 and subsequently, after two investments, became a subsidiary of Kakao Games in 2020. With headquarters in Singapore offices in Thailand, Taiwan, Vietnam and Korea. Glohow helps businesses go global. Our solutions and services include co-publishing of mobile games and applications, strategy consultation, marketing, PR, product development, project management, LiveOps management, localization, media content production, design, and arts. We are expanding the scope of our business by building our own platform to fulfill a vision of providing an optimized marketplace platform for businesses and consumers.

We are currently seeking an experienced Frontend Developer to join our team to develop our new product (freelance marketplace platform).

value: Minimum 3 years of experience in web service front-end development
Experience with Frontend Frameworks (either React, Vue, or Angular)
Ability to understand and use HTML, CSS, and JSW3C web standards
Willing to take the initiative to find and solve problems
Goal-oriented with exceptional execution skills
Open-minded about code reviews
Experience with RESTful API development and Docker/Kubernetes
Possesses an understanding and experience with ECMAScript and HTML5 API
Experiences working with Java & Spring Framework
Experience contributing to JavaScript-based open-source
Understanding and experience of web performance measurement and optimization
Interested in new and emerging technologies and trends
Experience in performance measurement, analysis, and optimization
Language Skills: Vietnamese, English (Limited~professional working proficiency)
Benefits:
The perks of working with us;
Five-day work week 09:00 am. to 06:00 pm
When your life works, Your work works!
Birthday Leave
TGIS (Thank God Its Six Hour Today!)
Annual leave
Happiness comes first, let's enjoy our treats!
Company Trip (Playshop)
Team Building Session
Snacks Bar
Festival Event
Birthday Gifts
Because your good health is our secret weapon!
Annual Health Check-up
Sick Leave
Work at Glohow:
Global Working Environment
Constantly learning and growing in the global working environment, you are encouraged to experience different areas of business across various countries.
Diversity
Work with an open mindset and allow people to share their ideas to develop a multinational and multicultural organization that respectsdiverse ideas to accomplish the final result.
Specialty Improvement

With the diversity, individuality, and charm of every member of Glohow, our warm working culture encourages all members to grow and improve. Every member has their own specialty and skillset - so we call each otherby our names, not by our positions or levels.

data.title: Intern Research Developer
data.content:
We are looking for full-time or part-time research developers for developing novel research prototypes and production software systems. You will join a research project, work online, and be mentored by Professor Kevin Chang and senior graduate students at UIUC. You are expected to commit flexibly from 10 hours/week (part-time) to 40 hours/week (which will be a full-time position). The positions are open immediately for a term of six months and will renew/continue, depending on performance, at the end of each term.

Project Description: AI-based knowledge discovery and acquisition by exploring, searching, and synthesizing knowledge from large scale data on the Internet. We are building next generation search services to help users explore data and acquire knowledge. We will organize a corpus of text data (e.g., the Web, social media, or scientific/technical literature) by extracting and profiling entities, relations, and concepts, and developing an effective search facility to support data exploration and knowledge acquisition.

benefits.value: Competitive compensation package with private health insurance, training and sport supports
Appealing bonus at the end of each year
Good environment for improving your personal and technical skills
Opportunity to work at all fronts to develop such skills required for a full-stack developer
Monday - Friday

data.title: Web Application Developer (JavaScript, Angular)
data.content:
We are Samsung Ho Chi Minh City Research & Development Center (SHRC); our vision is to be THE Global No.1 Digital Appliance Software R&D Center.
We develop all software products related to Digital Appliances such as Devices (SET), Mobile Phones, Web and Servers.
And we perform the entire software development activities, including all the concept, design, implementation and testing.
As a Global Digital Appliance Software Center, we are working with relevant departments all over the World, including Factory, Marketing team, QA, etc.
You will be greatly inspired by the huge global R&D environment in Samsung Electronics.
"Inspire the World, Create the Future" let's get it together!

data.title: Java Developer (Middle and Senior)
data.content:
SoftRoad Vietnam Co., Ltd. is a 100% subsidiary branch of SoftRoad Co., Ltd., headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

SoftRoad Co., Ltd. Japan (the parent company) was established in 2001. It is the largest professional AI system upgrade company in Japan. The System Reform technology experiences an average annual growth rate of 30%. The clientele consists of over 30% of the top 200 companies in Japan and worldwide.

The company is listed on the Topix stock index and is expanding its business operations into the European and American markets.

With over 30 high-level R&D employees dedicated to AI system development and more than 350 management and programming staff, the company's work scope and level are fundamentally equivalent to Japan's largest software companies like NEC and Fujitsu.

To meet the demands of expanding business and venturing into the European and American markets, SoftRoad Vietnam Co., Ltd. was established. The company's current projects mainly come from Japanese clients, and in the near future, additional projects from clients in Europe, America, and other regions will be added. The goal is to establish the company as the world's premier AI system upgrade provider.

benefits.value: Mức lương theo trình độ và mức độ cố gắng, điều chỉnh lương thường xuyên
Lương, phúc lợi và cơ hội thăng tiến
Thưởng cuối năm cho nhân viên

Công ty cung cấp cho nhân viên những cơ hội tốt để nâng cao năng lực cá nhân và thăng tiến, những người xuất sắc có thể nhanh chóng được đề bạt lên các vị trí như chuyên viên kỹ thuật, PL, PM, trưởng phòng
Người lao động có cơ hội làm việc tại Nhật Bản, Trung Quốc và các khu vực khác, có cơ hội định cư và chuyển tiếp sang Nhật Bản
Đóng bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm y tế theo luật pháp Việt Nam
Được nghỉ phép theo quy định của luật lao động Việt Nam
Bữa tối miễn phí cho nhân viên làm thêm giờ
Tặng quà sinh nhật cho nhân viên, quà lễ, v.v
Nhân viên được đào tạo thêm về ngôn ngữ (tiếng Nhật hoặc tiếng Anh), công nghệ, kỹ năng mềm, v.v
Không khí và môi trường làm việc tích cực, năng động, mọi người hòa thuận, giúp đỡ nhau trong việc
Khu văn phòng nằm trong khu vực nội thành Hà Nội, giao thông thuận tiện

data.title: Project Leader (BrSE, Japanese speaking)
data.content:
ONE OF THE TOP ICT JAPANESE COMPANIES IN VIETNAM.

NEC Corp is a leader in the integration of IT and network technologies that benefit businesses and people around the world. NEC has more than 50 countries, 289 branches, and 117,418 employees worldwide. Under the company's corporate message of "Orchestrating a brighter world," NEC aims to help solve a wide range of challenging issues and to create new social value for the changing world of tomorrow.

Established in 2006, up to now, NEC Vietnam has grown with more than 160 employees in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. We have been working hard to carry out many social contribution activities to bring more laughter and improve the quality of life.

benefits.value: Working time: Mon-Fri, Hybrid working mode (WFH available)
13th Salary + Year-End Reward (a half month) + Excellent Bonus (up to 5 months)
Special allowance for foreign language certificate (up to 500USD/month)
Full social package (SI, HI, UI) & Premium healthcare insurance (Aon)
Annual Health Check at the top healthcare center
Up to 19 days of paid leave
Free Japanese class; 1:1 class with native teachers
Udemy account provided & Sponsor examination fee for technical certificates such as AWS, Azure, PMP, etc and get the incentive (up to 10M)
Many company activities to tighten the relationship between employees: Company trip, Year-end Event, Team building, Sports Day, Family Day, Outing Trip, etc.
Reward Most Valuable Player (MVP) for individual & team twice a year
Sport clubs provided (100% sponsored by company): Football, Badminton
Professional environment with clear procedures and good working facilities
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in Japan, and APAC.

data.title: Senior Mobile Developer (iOS, Android, or Flutter)
data.content:
Passionate about OpenSource and mindful about delivering a good user experience, you will be taking part in writing mobile applications. As part of this, you will participate in the design, architecture, and writing of the following application:

  • An open-source multi-platform (Flutter) email application based on the JMAP protocol – TeamMail
  • An open-source multi-platform (Flutter) application for connecting to Matrix – an open network for secure, decentralized communication – Twake

data.title: Senior Fullstack Developer (PHP, React JS)
data.content:
Are you a talented Senior PHP Developer with exceptional programming skills and a solid understanding of PHP? Do you have a passion for building robust and scalable applications that meet the needs of customers? If so, we want to hear from you!

We are looking for an experienced Senior PHP Developer to join our team. As a key member of our development team, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality software solutions that meet our customers' needs.

100% gross salary during 2 months of probation

Parking: the company covers the monthly parking fee for employee motorbikes
Annual salary appraisal
Private health insurance: including accident, outpatient, in-patient, maternity, and dental for all permanent employees who pass 2-month probation.
12 days of annual leaves per year (with the ability to carry over to the following year)
Adding one more annual leave day for each five-year anniversary.
Sports club: the company has a monthly fund for sport activity

data.title: DevOps Engineer
data.content:
We expect tangible assistance from you in accelerating the launch of the product to the market; we are talking about the notorious time to market. DevOps and we are confident that this can be achieved through automation of the software life cycle, readiness, and ability to write appropriate scripts. The main task of a DevOps engineer is to minimize human influence on the delivery of releases to the production area, which means that the lives of both development and operations are improved.

You will become part of the Twake Work Place Team, this is an open-source digital workplace for enterprise and medium business, open source equivalent of MS Team/Slack. We are available for some enterprise customers in the B2B segment via SSO. Availability for the B2C segment is planned for February 2024.
